meta.content: st. charles public schools, minnesota, district 858, saint charles, SCHS, SCES, MN, district #858, isd 858, i.s.d. 858, st. charles, st charles, education, school, high, elementary, middle, winona, elba, saratoga, utica, altura,

meta.name: description
meta.content: This is the homepage for St. Charles High School and St. Charles Elementary School in St. Charles MN., which also serves the surrounding towns of Elba, Utica, and Altura. Info on teachers, coaches, school board, test scores, policies & the lunch menu.

div.div: The St. Charles Public Schools does not discriminate on the basis of sex/gender, sexual orientation, race, color, creed, national origin, religion, sex, disability, receipt of public assistance, or marital status and age in its programs and activities.
For the St. Charles Foundation for Academic Excellence website click here.
